mapper.insert: INSERT INTO memberlog(m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_joinDate, m_status, access_token, refresh_token, m_phone, m_idx, ml_var1) VALUES(#{m_id}, #{m_pw}, #{m_name}, NOW(), #{m_status}, #{access_token}, #{refresh_token}, #{m_phone}, #{m_idx}, #{ml_var1})

INSERT INTO memberlog(m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_editDate, m_status, access_token, refresh_token, m_phone, m_idx, ml_var1) VALUES(#{m_id}, #{m_pw}, #{m_name}, NOW(), #{m_status}, #{access_token}, #{refresh_token}, #{m_phone}, #{m_idx}, #{ml_var1})

INSERT INTO memberlog(m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_dropDate, m_status, access_token, refresh_token, m_phone, m_idx, ml_var1) VALUES(#{m_id}, #{m_pw}, #{m_name}, NOW(), #{m_status}, #{access_token}, #{refresh_token}, #{m_phone}, #{m_idx}, #{ml_var1})
